DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy Shingigu Charcoal moxibustion scientifically objectively .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Trials Comparison Two Kinds Moxibustion
DOC.detailed_description: Moxibustion traditional treatment regulate circulation Qi-blood making body warm prevent treat disease . Recently many kind moxibustion moxibustion apparatus develop . However evaluate efficacy moxibustion insufficient . Thus , need objective evaluate efficacy moxibustion .
DOC.criteria: 18~65 year old Hyperthyroidism Heart disease ( Heart failure , angina pectoris , myocardial infarction ) Uncontrolled hypertension ( SBP > 145mmHg DBP > 95mmHg ) Severe renal disorder Severe liver disorder Diabetes Mellitus Female duration pregnancy
